Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface Bounded

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DimensionsProvider, NodeProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AABBCollided, AABBSideAwareCollided, BufferedMoveable, Collider, Moveable, Placeable, SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, RectangleEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
    public interface Bounded
extends DimensionsProvider, NodeProvider
    Implementing this interface exposes the getNonTransformedBounds() method, which returns the bounds, aka Bounding Box, of this Entity.
